messages.msgSnippet: Um...I just wanted to be sure that I didn t miss something and this is not for me-Karen, but another one? I ve been so busy, I ve only skimmed most of the
messages.messageBody:
Um...I just wanted to be sure that I didn't miss something and this is not
for me-Karen, but another one? I've been so busy, I've only skimmed most of the
emails recently (I joined like 3 or 4 more yahoo groups and I'm chock full of
email each day, lol!), so I may well have missed something, and I don't want
to appear silent if anything was indeed for or at me...

Karen...in Southern Ca :)
